author: Sean O'Kane
title: How GM and Ford switched out pickup trucks for breathing machines
description: The parts of the US that are hardest hit by the novel coronavirus pandemic are in desperate need of ventilators, which help keep COVID-19 patients alive. To fill the shortage, ventilator companies are working with automakers to build as many of these breathin…
content: In the most severe cases of COVID-19, a patients lungs become so inflamed and full of fluid that they no longer deliver enough oxygen to the bloodstream to keep that person alive. One way to counteract this is by using a ventilator, which helps the patients l… [+13252 chars]
